name: protocol-subgraphs
description: This package contains subgraphs of the Aave protocol v2

scripts.prepare:subgraph: mustache ./config/${NETWORK}-${VERSION}.json ./templates/${BLOCKCHAIN}.subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && rm -rf generated && npm run generate:schema && npm run subgraph:codegen && npm run subgraph:build
scripts.test: VERSION=v2 BLOCKCHAIN=gnosis NETWORK=gnosis env-cmd npm run prepare:subgraph
scripts.deploy:hosted:gnosis: VERSION=v2 BLOCKCHAIN=gnosis NETWORK=gnosis env-cmd npm run prepare:subgraph && SLUG=realtoken-thegraph/rmm-realt-v2 env-cmd npm run subgraph:deploy:hosted
scripts.deploy:hosted:sepolia: VERSION=v3 BLOCKCHAIN=sepolia NETWORK=sepolia env-cmd npm run prepare:subgraph && env-cmd npm run subgraph:deploy:sepolia

author: AAVE <tech@aave.com>
